comments.comment: Marzia editing is the best ever, she has such a beautiful, calm style that always makes me wish I was living a similar life. It doesn't feel like it's about money or opportunity, it's just about living your life, and doing things you want to do.

i cannot believe you are 33… i’ve watched since i was probably 9 or 10 and i’ve just watched you grow to the man you are now and you’ve been a HUGE part in my life as i am growing to the man i’m becoming at the age of 20, just watching this has me in tears man, so happy you’re enjoying your life, and just being the wonderful and badass person you are. Happy birthday felix, much love over here man, bro fist

I know these videos don't perform as well; but I want to let you know, as someone who's watched your videos for nearly a decade, I genuinely enjoy this new era of content. Thank you so much for keeping us involved in this great journey.
I’m so proud of the comment sections of pewds recently, I think its really wholesome that everyone is sharing how happy they are for Felix. Very very sweet 🥹
I can't believe pewds is living his best life, growing up with him witnessing his development in life has me in tears

dude dont ever apologize for not vlogging during some moments, it's alr enough that we get to see your peaceful lives in japan; it truly brings peace to me during my stressful days, and i out of so many people can't thank you enough.
Always look forward to seeing these vlogs. So genuine and fun to watch
I know how akward it can be to vlog, but I'm very thankful for your sacrifice pewds. Love these videos

Really love how the video always ends with the sound of a tape being ejected. Its a nostalgic feeling of a distant memory becoming a video and 2 - 5 years later you'll find it again and play its contents and say "Those were good times" its such as satisfying outro of a video. Have a wonderful life ahead of you Felix and Marzia.
Watching you and Marzia in these vlogs is like watching my retired parents finally using up all those saved up money from decades of hardwork. Literally brings tears of happiness in my eyes :')
I can’t tell you how heartwarming these vlogs are. Every shot is like a painting
It’s incredible how much more calm and relaxed these videos make me feel.
Its cool how drastically his content has changed through the years

Marzia’s edits are such a vibe
Also Happy belated Birthday to both of you!
Seeing Felix develop as a YouTuber and a person is the most wholesome thing in the world brings tears of joy to my eyes truly hope he lives his best life
I think it's time we campaign to make this guy the next most interesting man in the world.

Pewds and Marzia have taken vlog videos and transcended them into high art. The calm music, the actual day in the life events, the beautiful imagery. It’s stunning. What makes them better is knowing the 2 are living happy together. This is something to hold on to.
Felix: the YouTuber that cannot be corrupted, ever.
Love how much of Pewds fans have grown up with him so many of us are in our late 20's/early 30's, so these vlogs actually do speak to us

These vlogs are such happy/sad videos to me.  Happy because I like seeing Felix enjoy himself after all he's done, also because it reminds me of what life can be life.  Sad because my life is nowhere as calm & peaceful as this.  Love you BRO ARMY, love you PEWDIEPIE.  Thank you all for the wonderful community, & thank you Pewd's for the entertainment & reflections throughout the years.

These vlogs, in addition to their quality and relaxing vibes, motivate me so much to keep going and to focus on what I want to do, what I have to do, and to think about myself more clearly. Cannot thank you enough!,

Try to remember staggering your hands a little when you pop up instead of placing them directly parallel, your shoulders will turn sooner and help you get a balanced stance sooner. Just like that 8:52
I want more collaborations of Pewdiepie with Felix please
That's so cute. Growing up seeing Edgar and now even a new thing of when poods says "are you looking for trouble," made my heart warm
The inspiration you give to so many people is wild man. You’re living this life most of us dream of, I admire it. Thanks for being awesome man.

Happy belated Birthday to both of you!
I'm Japanese and I'm a fan of yours.
I am very happy that you like Japan.
I think that there are many difficult things, but please enjoy Japan at your own pace.
(I'm not good at English, so I'm sorry if the sentence is wrong.)

I had a brief hiatus with your vids around when you finally made it to Japan, but watching this makes me so happy for you. You're living your best life. In Japan, surfing, doing YouTube not as a job but for fun, and you have a beautiful family. And as you made this life, in some small way, we got to see it with you, and I think that's really beautiful. It really makes me admire you as a person and respect your tenacity and charm.
Love you Pewds, I can't wait to see what else you do. You're a cool guy :)

Man, these are so warm and wholesome. Don't worry about the not vlogging some part, I think you have a very healthy balance of what you want to share. You are not there for us, but for you. We are happy enough to just get a small glimpse of your happiness. In my opinion, this Japan arc is this channel's peak because goals and dreams have finally been achieved. Keep living the dream, you will always have our unconditional love and support!
I love seeing Felix live the life he deserves to live, he was my childhood and i can't thank him enough for being who he is
7:25 “there you go train nerds, you’re welcome”  gotta love Felix mannn
I love you Felix. You've been a vibe my whole life. Thank you. I'll never stop watching.
The editing is always so soothing and aesthetic, can’t wait to see more vlogs!!

Hey pewds! I don't leave comments on videos usually, but I feel some type of way right now. I just wanted to say that earlier today I was considering committing suicide, but I kind of went through a journey with your content for a few hours and seeing how you have evolved and changed as a person, as well as grown, made me so happy. I watched your videos about moving to japan and it makes me so happy to see such beautiful souls, such as Marzia and yourself, and to see you enjoying youtube to the fullest now. I'd love to see more videos with the dogs, and camping trips those would be so fun! Seeing you explore japan makes me feel like there's so much more to this world than what I'm going through right now, and it pushes me a little further to keep going. I dont know if you'll ever see this, but I appreciate you as a person, watching you growing up and stuff. Thank you so much :)
Japan seems so otherworldly, I wish more places were like Japan. Happy for pewds for living his dream and totally coolest YouTuber ever with surfing and all that!
I like how localized a lot of japan is, wish we had architecture design like that over here in the states it’s so beautiful

I love pewds already and his content, but his vlogs have always felt so peaceful and genuine . They're my favorites! I get so happy whenever he posts one :) Happy late Birthday Maya, Marzia and Felix <3
I swear that watching them living their best lifes makes me smile and feel happy and comforted. Thank you for this kind of videos.

Man 4:15 made me cry for a bit
I really like watching his journey in japan
Man, I'm going to miss Maya when it's her time to pass on.  She has been so fortunate to have Felix and Marzia as her caretakers.  And hopefully Edgar won't be too lonely.  Bittersweet thoughts!
Whenever I watch these, I genuinely just feel so happy. I’m so happy you are both living your best life, and bringing your sweet puggies with you. Wishing you the happiest of days
It’s just so beautiful to see pewds make videos that really represents him now. So much love to pewds.
Thank you so much for making these vlogs, Felix and Marzia. They are simply beautiful and so relaxing and calming to watch. ️

Sometimes I need to remind myself this is the same guy I watched sitting in a basement screaming about barrels. Makes me so happy to see Felix living his dream!
Love you Pewds! How far you've come
Bruv, it’s nice to see that you’ve made it. In the 10+ years I’ve been watching, you have never been more calm. I strive to reach this level of comfort.

I can’t help but just smile while watching these vlogs, I haven’t seen anything more relaxed on YouTube ever. I love how Felix doesn’t force anything and just films what he wants to, but also puts so much effort into the art and editing of it. It’s perfect. I keep feeling like crying while watching and I don’t know why

Halloween in Japan is an interesting time. In most of the country, it’s just considered an excuse to sell more sweets to kids (they usually have a section of the supermarket decorated up to that end). But the average Japanese person just has a vague image costumes and parties, and maybe foreign people getting rowdy in Shibuya. I TRIED to explain the “trick-or-treating” thing to my neighbors and set something up so my kids could experience it, but everyone just seemed really confused.  

As far as spooky characters to dress up as, I think the Japanese can hold their own. I made a video about traditional “Yokai” (creatures of folklore) if anyone is interested.

Happy birthday to both of you! ^^
Honestly these vlogs make me appreciate my own life a lot where I live, and the beauty found in nature and even the simple things around. Really relaxing, love these. :D

Watching these videos make me cry. I don’t know if it’s just because I’m so happy for you, or if it is because I dream of a love like you and Marzia have. Maybe it’s both. Absolutely love the peace and happiness you’ve found Felix, I hope that one day I’ll find it too️

Seeing all you went through. The hours you put in and daily uploads you use to do. The jumping outta closets just make us laugh lol. This channel allowed us to see your 10 year grind, and you’ve definitely earned this rest.

I know pew is on his trip for a resting time but it's hard for me anytime recalling the past. Outlast trials was just out few days ago and I couldn't tell you how much I miss his gameplay. I just hope when he has enough of his retirement, he can comeback to play one of the most iconic series game he has ever played in his entire life. Just having fun, living with his fulfillment and I can start watching that game all day long!

But it's also kinda bittersweet to see him go from our youtuber friend to just a happy dude sometimes showing us his life.
Japan is just insanely gorgeous, it gets more beautiful looking with each vlog. It really makes me wanna visit one day hopefully.

seeing this video be the worst performing on the channel in over a decade is heartbreaking. it’s a great vid, cheers pewds

Your fun, entertaining videos from Japan are very evocative for me… Reminds me of the great time I had when I was living in Japan a few years ago. Thanks for sharing your adventures and congratulations to both of you on successfully navigating another trip around the sun!
This new PewDiePie is so wholesome. Not one cuss word in the entire video! My son was very disappointed. Love you!
You were a massive part of my childhood and seeing you so happy and finally living life how you have been wanting for so long is amazing.

I love seeing these vlogs because it shows such an authentic experience besides the touristy city experience in japan. The countrysides are especially the places I would love the visit, but the beaches too. The fact that Felix picked up surfing really gives me enjoyment to watch, as it's something I would love to try too and can just live through it vicariously on his vlogs. I wonder if he'll also ever pick up motorcycling in Japan, since it's a fairly significant sub-culture in Japan too. It's definitely one of my dreams to moto-tour around Japan, visiting both cityscapes and countryside landmarks.

I love these low-key Japan blogs so much. I’m having a rather stressful Monday here at work and this video is like therapy for me to just sit in my car enjoy my lunch break and watch relaxing Japan Vlogs.

I'm not going to lie I had to double look and triple look and quadruple look to make sure my eyes weren't deceiving me but seeing Marzia just made me smile so much because I cried so hard when she made her goodbye YouTube video and I have wanted so badly in my heart to see her on a video again just to see her all happy and bubbly and just to see you guys Happy together living your best life just brings the biggest smile to my face. Pewds is so right. Parents should be limiting how long their kids are playing games, and it's best to start when they are young so they know and understand limits and boundaries at a young age! Another thing parents can do is allowing their kids to play video games but sit with them and watch them play! Learning about what your child is excited about can be a huge bonding experience that parents are missing out on. The screen should never be like a baby sitter!
